jathyanthara aparadha adhikaranaya wisin naduwak bhara ganimata nam ema naduwa sambandhayen deshiya prathikarma bhawitha kara thibima awashya natha.maknisadayath mema adhikaranaya abhiyachana adhikaranayak nowana heyini.ese wuwath kisiyam naduwak deshiya adhikarana mangin nisi lesa wibhaga kara thibe nam ho ese karamin pawathinne nam ewani naduwak wibhaga kirima sandaha bhara noganna bawata jathyanthara aparadha adhikaranaya wisin prakasha kala hakiya.
